TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UITextBorderStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration of visual styles for text borders.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITextBorderStyle Bezel = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Displays a bezel around the text field. Generally used for standard data-entry fields.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITextBorderStyle Line = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Displays a thin rectangle around the text field.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITextBorderStyle None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The text field does not have a visible border.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITextBorderStyle RoundedRect = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Displays a rounded rectangle border around the text field.
